description:
When performing operations on a pandas DataFrame, such as dropping columns or calculating row means, it is often necessary to specify the "axis". But what exactly is an axis? In this video, I'll help you to build a mental model for understanding the axis parameter so that you will know when and how to use it.

This is video 11 of 30 in the series, `Easier data analysis in Python with pandas <http://www.dataschool.io/easier-data-analysis-with-pandas/>`__. The notebook and datasets shown in the video are available on `GitHub <https://github.com/justmarkham/pandas-videos>`__.
title: How do I use the "axis" parameter in pandas?
